Instruction: Whisk eggs in a mixing bowl until smooth. Add shredded and diced zucchini, then season with salt, pepper, Parmesan cheese, and basil. Gradually add flour, stirring to eliminate dry lumps until well combined.
Preheat the oil in a large skillet to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Fry the batter in hot oil by spoonfuls, ensuring not to overcrowd the oil. Cook until each side of the fritters is golden brown, approximately 4 minutes. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate before serving.
